column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4418_d618965eb8163544d97a213b1c0e3f629c59669b/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
BTW, I think any Ubuntu/Debian versions that still have the libdb4.8++-dev package are end-of-life. We should add something like `(with the PPA)`.\n
